name: tides
description: Multi-platform MCP application suite with React web, React Native mobile, and Cloudflare Workers server

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:mobile && npm run test:web
scripts.clean: npm run clean:server && npm run clean:mobile && npm run clean:web
scripts.clean:mobile: cd apps/mobile && rm -rf node_modules && npx react-native clean
scripts.clean:web: cd apps/web && rm -rf node_modules dist build
scripts.mobile:setup: cd apps/mobile && npm install && cd ios && bundle install && bundle exec pod install
